greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of b(n)-b(n+1), where b(n) = n/((n+1)(n+2)) = A026741/A045896.
comment: b(n) = a(n+1) is multiplicative with b(2^e) = 1 if p = 2, b(3^e) = p^(e-1), 3, p^e if p >= 5.
link: M. Kaneko, The Akiyama-Tanigawa algorithm for Bernoulli numbers, J. Integer Sequences, 3 (2000), #00.2.9.
xref: Cf. A051713. Row 3 of table in A051714/A051715.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
